chart_description: This chart displays the amount of swap memory used by each user on the system.

dimension_descriptions.1000: Swap memory used by user with UID 1000.
dimension_descriptions.1001: Swap memory used by user with UID 1001.
dimension_descriptions.32: Swap memory used by user with UID 32.
dimension_descriptions.65532: Swap memory used by user with UID 65532.
dimension_descriptions.65535: Swap memory used by user with UID 65535.
dimension_descriptions.81: Swap memory used by user with UID 81.
dimension_descriptions.998: Swap memory used by user with UID 998.
dimension_descriptions.999: Swap memory used by user with UID 999.
dimension_descriptions.cm: Swap memory used by cm user.
dimension_descriptions.man: Swap memory used by man user.
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: Swap memory used by messagebus user.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Swap memory used by netdata user.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: Swap memory used by nobody user.
dimension_descriptions.nut: Swap memory used by nut user.
dimension_descriptions.root: Swap memory used by root user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: Swap memory used by systemd-coredump user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-network: Swap memory used by systemd-network user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-timesync: Swap memory used by systemd-timesync user.
dimension_descriptions.vpopmail: Swap memory used by vpopmail user.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: Swap memory used by xfs user.
